title: Ep 357 | Phil Gets a New Party Barge & Jase Is NOT Happy with Missy's Grocery Store Buy
description:
Phil is pumped about his new party barge. Al teaches Phil all about the term "Karen." Phil shares his amazement at Jesus' disciple picks. Jase and Phil compare the IRS to the tax collectors of the Bible. Jase has a Michael Jackson experience while carrying some fish. Al remembers what happened when Phil decided it was time for him to learn to drive. And Jase is extremely displeased when he finds out that Missy bought the one thing you NEVER buy at the grocery store.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
